About Us

Our facilities are equipped with the latest state-of-the-art equipment. All our doctors are western qualified and well known in the market. We have an international visiting faculty program to introduce global best practices. We follow the motto “BECAUSE YOUR LIFE MATTERS” in our every action.

Surgeries (per year)

Organ Transplantation Center

AMC Organ Transplantation Center has performed Korea’s first successful heart, pancreas, and living donor liver transplantations. It has recorded the largest number of organ transplantation surgeries in Korea.
